title: Self Managed Analytics Reporting Tool
description: Transformed RDD codebase into optimised Spark SQL codebase for different metrics with 100K+ data records resulting in 80% reduction in processing time.

title: Click Stream Analysis
description: Developed efficent system to analyse large amounts of data on click by implementing various MapReduce, Hive and Spark jobs, resulting in 60% improvement in data processing speed.

title: Insurance Application
description: App to sign up, log in, perform CRUD operations and search for insurance policies. Implemented best practices like JavaDocs, Naming Conventions, Logging, Exception Handling, JUnit Testing.
